prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Step-by-step plan for the headless agent. Start with: You are running headlessly. There is no conversation â€” do not ask questions. Then list numbered steps. The last step must use NotifyUser to deliver results with a targetId linking the relevant record. Important: NotifyUser body is plain text only (max 750 chars), no markdown, no HTML, no links. Use numbered lists with record names only. Only one record can be linked via targetId.

context.title: Context
context.description: JSON object with context variables like record IDs. e.g. {"AccountId":"001xx"}

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: When to run in the users local time: minute hour dayOfMonth month dayOfWeek optionalYear. e.g. 0 9 ? * MON-FRI for weekdays at 9am, 30 14 ? * MON for Mondays at 2:30pm.
